import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add tag to ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/tags/{tagId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a tag to a ticket for categorization and filtering purposes.

**Prerequisites**
- Obtain available tags from tag management endpoints or create new tags as needed

**Related Endpoints**
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags/\{tagId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-tag) – Remove a tag
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/tags](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-tags) – Bulk update tags

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"tagId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the tag to add","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  label={undefined}
